Reviews.Title: “Worst Place on Earth.”
Reviews.Author: HannahFK
Reviews.Content: officially worst hostel stayed months travelling mould filth scary pillows time home else claiming conditions ive experienced leaving rubbish cleaned 5 day stay opted homeless day return hostel beyond comprehension

Reviews.Title: “Sleeping on the streets would have been an improvement”
Reviews.Author: SamZ369
Reviews.Content: stayed hostel friend nights nights hostel disgusting hold breaths enter washrooms allocate pair shoes enter showers covered black hair unidentifiable substances blanket covered stains returned various people sleeping bed lockers people highlight hotel experience seeing shocked disgusted responses people entered time honestly splurge extra euros save yourself feeling contracting diseases bed stay else

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for!!”
Reviews.Author: Adam E Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel friends cleanish bed sheets clean changed regularly downside majorly steep staircase climbing ladder espically top floor lockers locks guy help desk wasnt bed night cheap cant complain

Reviews.Title: “worse hostel I ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: anaojjoana
Reviews.Content: liked location disliked else location mucky completely unclean bathroom disgusting dont forget flip flops thinking staying hostel lockers simply dont lock stole bag stairs terrible normal amsterdam bad definitely worse hostel stayed tip twice hostel location hostels amsterdam 3 5 euros hostel doesnt worth

Reviews.Title: “would stay there again”
Reviews.Author: Amy C
Reviews.Content: booked hostel 1 hour plane amsterdam pay hostel isnt cleanest ther 3 3 females didnt sharing reception friendly ourselves policy arent mixed dorms lockers safe left belongings day valuables ie money passport fall top floor stairs steep narrow stair dam worth money minutes walk amazing crepe waffle shop underneath munchies easy

Reviews.Title: “Great location but nil security”
Reviews.Author: Linhbo
Reviews.Content: location red light district noisy warning guests leave lockers stay stuff stolen locker guest stole key reception located waffle shop front door people freely hostel bit noisy dirty found centipede fine cheap bed else

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as I thought it would be!”
Reviews.Author: welsh_bookworn
Reviews.Content: stayed hostel week nights concerned reading reviews travelling stayed 4 hostel floor steps steep looked narrow steep floors stairs buildings amsterdam dont theres despite heart city centre quiet night slept beds fairly comfortable odd selection bedding sheet duvet party thick blanket bathrooms clean tidy whenever staff spoke pretty friendly waffles downstairs wasnt luxury stay expect pay â£16 night city centre accommodation close centraal station dam square

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: ianholloway2011
Reviews.Content: comments bit unfair ok special thats youd expect hostel location road dam square main red light district beds comfy bathroom clean stairs steep buildings amsterdam built manageable werent rats mice id advise people own sheets specks blood sheets provided cheap stay basic pay

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE!”
Reviews.Author: SnowWhite86
Reviews.Content: accidentally requested 8person instead 4person charged 8 beds nights woke 4 roommates refunded 40 euros besides ripping revolting wretched bathroom broken storage lockers lock door didnt properly dirty blankets 3 flights dangerous ridiculous winding narrow stairs barely squeeze backpacks stay else

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: jh07rw
Reviews.Content: bunch students party looking cheap location experience real amsterdam hotel provided heart city near train station easy beds clean comfy 24 hour reception please yes stairs steep style buildings center amsterdam recommend students travelers looking decent stay budget
